section.p: Known Subclasses: Longitudinal Care Wound Observation (V2)

This template reflects a discrete observation about a patient's problem. Because it is a discrete observation, it will have a statusCode of "completed". The effectiveTime, also referred to as the "biologically relevant time" is the time at which the observation holds for the patient. For a provider seeing a patient in the clinic today, observing a history of heart attack that occurred five years ago, the effectiveTime is five years ago.
The effectiveTime of the Problem Observation is the definitive indication of whether or not the underlying condition is resolved. If the problem is known to be resolved, then an effectiveTime/high would be present. If the date of resolution is not known, then effectiveTime/high will be present with a nullFlavor of "UNK".

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1198-14926, CONF:1198-14927, CONF:1198-32508 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2015-08-01"
SHALL conform to Problem Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @negationInd (CONF:1198-10139)
The negationInd is used to indicate the absence of the condition in observation/value. A negationInd of "true" coupled with an observation/value of SNOMED code 64572001 "Disease (disorder)" indicates that the patient has no known conditions.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:1198-9050)
If the problem is known to be resolved, but the date of resolution is not known, then the high element SHALL be present, and the nullFlavor attribute SHALL be set to 'UNK'. Therefore, the existence of an high element within a problem does indicate that the problem has been resolved.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD", which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Problem 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.7.4 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-9058)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Problem Type (SNOMED CT) 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.7.2 STATIC 2012-06-01 (CONF:1198-9045)
contain zero or one [0..1] text
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:1198-9049)/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1198-19112)

SHOULD contain [0..*] author such that it (CONF:1198-31147)
Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1198-29951, CONF:1198-31531, CONF:1198-29952)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Conforms to Prognosis Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.113)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1198-31063, CONF:1198-31532, CONF:1198-31064)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Conforms to Priority Preference (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.143)

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1198-9063, CONF:1198-9068, CONF:1198-15591)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Conforms to Problem Status (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.6)

contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it
Conforms to Health Status Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.5)
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
effectiveTime, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] low (CONF:1198-15603)
effectiveTime, if present, MAY contain zero or one [0..1] high (CONF:1198-15604)
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
SHALL conform to Problem Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:9041, R2.1=CONF:1198-9041)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:9042, R2.1=CONF:1198-9042)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @negationInd (CONF:1198-10139)
The negationInd is used to indicate the absence of the condition in observation/value. A negationInd of "true" coupled with an observation/value of SNOMED code 64572001 "Disease (disorder)" indicates that the patient has no known conditions.
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:9043, R2.1=CONF:1198-9043)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Problem Type (SNOMED CT) 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.7.2 STATIC 2012-06-01 (CONF:1198-9045)
contain zero or one [0..1] text
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:1198-9049)/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1198-19112)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:1198-9050)
If the problem is known to be resolved, but the date of resolution is not known, then the high element SHALL be present, and the nullFlavor attribute SHALL be set to 'UNK'. Therefore, the existence of an high element within a problem does indicate that the problem has been resolved.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD", which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Problem 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.7.4 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-9058)

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship (Age At Onset) such that it (CONF:9059, CONF:9060, CONF:15590, R2.1=CONF:1198-9059, R2.1=CONF:1198-9060, R2.1=CONF:1198-15590)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Conforms to Age Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.31)

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship (Problem Status) such that it (CONF:9063, CONF:9068, CONF:15591)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Conforms to Problem Status (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.6)

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship (Health Status) such that it (CONF:9067, CONF:9064, CONF:15592)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Conforms to Health Status Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.5)

SHOULD contain [0..*] author such that it (CONF:1198-31147)
Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1198-29951, CONF:1198-31531, CONF:1198-29952)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Conforms to Prognosis Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.113)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1198-31063, CONF:1198-31532, CONF:1198-31064)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Conforms to Priority Preference (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.143)

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1198-9063, CONF:1198-9068, CONF:1198-15591)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Conforms to Problem Status (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.6)

contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it
Conforms to Health Status Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.5)
The text, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference (CONF:15587)
reference, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @value (CONF:15588)
reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:15589)
The effectiveTime element , if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] low (CONF:15603)
effectiveTime, if present, MAY contain zero or one [0..1] high (CONF:15604)
value MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @nullFlavor (CONF:10141)

If the diagnosis is unknown or the SNOMED code is unknown, @nullFlavor SHOULD be UNK. If the code is something other than SNOMED, @nullFlavor SHOULD be OTH and the other code SHOULD be placed in the translation element (CONF:10142)
entryRelationship with target entry Age Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" True (CONF:9069, R2.1=CONF:9069)
value MAY contain zero or more [0..*] translation (CONF:16749, R2.1=CONF:1198-16749)
translation, if present, MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @code (CodeSystem: ICD10CM 2.16.840.1.113883.6.90 STATIC) (CONF:16750, R2.1=CONF:1198-16750)
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
effectiveTime, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] low (CONF:1198-15603)
effectiveTime, if present, MAY contain zero or one [0..1] high (CONF:1198-15604)
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:14926, CONF:14927 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4"
Consol Problem Observation The text, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference (CONF:15587)
Consol Problem Observation reference, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @value (CONF:15588)
Consol Problem Observation reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:15589)
Consol Problem Observation The effectiveTime element , if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] low (CONF:15603)
Consol Problem Observation effectiveTime, if present, MAY contain zero or one [0..1] high (CONF:15604)
Consol Problem Observation value MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @nullFlavor (CONF:10141)

Consol Problem Observation If the diagnosis is unknown or the SNOMED code is unknown, @nullFlavor SHOULD be UNK. If the code is something other than SNOMED, @nullFlavor SHOULD be OTH and the other code SHOULD be placed in the translation element (CONF:10142)
Consol Problem Observation entryRelationship with target entry Age Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" True (CONF:9069, R2.1=CONF:9069)
Consol Problem Observation value MAY contain zero or more [0..*] translation (CONF:16749, R2.1=CONF:1198-16749)
Consol Problem Observation translation, if present, MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @code (CodeSystem: ICD10CM 2.16.840.1.113883.6.90 STATIC) (CONF:16750, R2.1=CONF:1198-16750)
SHALL conform to CDA Observation
Consol Problem Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:9041, R2.1=CONF:1198-9041)
Consol Problem Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:9042, R2.1=CONF:1198-9042)
Consol Problem Observation MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @negationInd (CONF:10139)
Consol Problem Observation SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:9043, R2.1=CONF:1198-9043)
Consol Problem Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (Problem Type), which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Problem Type 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.7.2 STATIC 2008-12-18 (CONF:9045)
Consol Problem Observation SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] text (Problem Name) (CONF:9185)
Consol Problem Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:9049, R2.1=CONF:1198-9049)
Consol Problem Observation SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (Problem Date) (CONF:9050)

Consol Problem Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value (Problem Code) with @xsi:type="CD", which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Problem 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.7.4 DYNAMIC (CONF:9058)

Consol Problem Observation MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship (Age At Onset) such that it (CONF:9059, CONF:9060, CONF:15590, R2.1=CONF:1198-9059, R2.1=CONF:1198-9060, R2.1=CONF:1198-15590) Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ, and Conforms to Age Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.31)

Consol Problem Observation MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship (Problem Status) such that it (CONF:9063, CONF:9068, CONF:15591) Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR, and Conforms to Problem Status (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.6)

Consol Problem Observation MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship (Health Status) such that it (CONF:9067, CONF:9064, CONF:15592) Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR, and Conforms to Health Status Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.5)
